title: The Curtain pole
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: The lengths a man has to go to just to replace a broken curtain pole and the chaos and mayhem he causes is something to be believed in this farcical slapstick comedy. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence, Linda Arvidson, Arthur V. Johnson. Silent film with English intertitles.
